About CLEyeMulticamWPFTest Sample
=================================

The CLEyeMulticamWPFTest is a simple WPF application written in C#. 
It demonstrates the use of CLEyeMulticam API inside the managed C# WPF environment. 
If you plug in two PS3Eye caemras CLEyeMulticamWPFTest app will show two images 
displaying video from both cameras. The CLEyeMulticamWPFTest also demonstrates the 
use of multiple threads for camera image capturing. Furthermore it demonstrates
a simple way of wrapping CLEyeMulticam API into a C# class.

Software requirements:
======================

1. CL-Eye Platform Driver 4.0.0.x or greater
2. CL-Eye Platform SDK 1.0.x.x or greater
3. .NET 3.5 SP1 Framework
4. Visual Studio 2008 SP1 Express or better

Updates:
========

For the latest information and files downloads visit: http://codelaboratories.com
